/****************************************************************************
 *----------------- Instrument Driver Revision Information -----------------*
 ****************************************************************************/
MAJOR_VERSION                1     /* Instrument driver major version   */
MINOR_VERSION                0     /* Instrument driver minor version   */

CLASS_SPEC_MAJOR_VERSION     2     /* Class specification major version */
CLASS_SPEC_MINOR_VERSION     0     /* Class specification minor version */

SUPPORTED_INSTRUMENT_MODELS  "62006P-100-25,62012P-30-160,62012P-80-60,62012P-100-50,62012P-600-8"
DRIVER_VENDOR                "Chroma ATE INC."
DRIVER_DESCRIPTION           "DC Power Supply 62000P Series Instrument Driver"
